title: Combining Reinforcement Learning and Barrier Functions for Adaptive Risk Management in Portfolio Optimization. (arXiv:2306.07013v1 [q-fin.PM])
abstract: Reinforcement learning (RL) based investment strategies have been widely adopted in portfolio management (PM) in recent years. Nevertheless, most RL-based approaches may often emphasize on pursuing returns while ignoring the risks of the underlying trading strategies that may potentially lead to great losses especially under high market volatility. Therefore, a risk-manageable PM investment framework integrating both RL and barrier functions (BF) is proposed to carefully balance the needs for high returns and acceptable risk exposure in PM applications. Up to our understanding, this work represents the first attempt to combine BF and RL for financial applications. While the involved RL approach may aggressively search for more profitable trading strategies, the BF-based risk controller will continuously monitor the market states to dynamically adjust the investment portfolio as a controllable measure for avoiding potential losses particularly in downtrend markets. translated_title: 强化学习与障碍函数相结合的组合优化中的自适应风险管理策略
translated_abstract: 近年来，基于强化学习（RL）的投资策略在组合管理（PM）中被广泛采用。然而，大多数基于RL的方法往往强调追求回报，而忽视了潜在带来巨大损失的交易策略的风险，特别是在高市场波动性下。因此，提出了一种风险可管理的PM投资框架，该框架结合了RL和障碍函数（BF），以在PM应用中谨慎平衡高回报和可接受的风险敞口的需求。据我们所知，这项工作代表了首次尝试将BF和RL结合应用于金融领域。尽管涉及到的RL方法可能会积极寻找更有利可图的交易策略，但基于BF的风险控制器将持续监测市场状态，作为一种可控措施，动态调整投资组合以避免潜在损失，特别是在下跌市场中。此外，本论文提出了两种自适应模式来同时优化Risk-return和下降市场的抵御能力。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种组合优化中的自适应风险管理策略，结合了强化学习和障碍函数，旨在平衡高回报和合理风险敞口。这是首次尝试将BF和RL结合应用于金融领域。
en_tdlr: This study proposes an adaptive risk management strategy in portfolio optimization, which combines reinforcement learning and barrier functions to balance high returns and reasonable risk exposure. It represents the first attempt to apply BF and RL together in the financial field.
